participant_1.name: David
participant_1.personality: Caring and laid-back, David enjoys spending quality time with his family and often shares his thoughts on parenting.
participant_1.background: i am a stay at home dad. i've a son who is in junior high school. i spent a decade working in the human services field. horror movies are my favorites.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Disciplined and straightforward, Jake values loyalty and has a strong sense of duty.
participant_2.background: my grandfather served in world war a. i'm in the army. i did not graduate high school. i live in canada.

content.text: my dad is pretty traditional for a college teacher and he didn t like it
